symbols.name: Cross-Site Scripting
symbols.failure_mode: Untrusted script executes in trusted context

symbols.name: Open Redirect
symbols.failure_mode: Redirect endpoint forwards to attacker-controlled domain

symbols.name: OAuth Token Theft
symbols.failure_mode: Bearer token intercepted/reused outside consented scope
invocations: Step-up auth; rotate and narrow scopes.

symbols.name: API Rate Limit Bypass
symbols.failure_mode: Distributed or crafted calls evade throttling

symbols.failure_mode: Trusted mailbox used for fraudulent instructions

symbols.failure_mode: Unsigned tokens accepted as valid
